code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site

observation.value: shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site

td.content: s:white m marine aged 41 years presents with 2 years history of moderate weakness, moderate weight loss over several months, Cancer. patient reports moderate vomiting. Patient does not smoke ocas ETOH on w/e o:Height 71 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

td.content: s:a 41 year old white male with moderate weight loss over several months, moderate vomiting and moderate weakness. he has had several such episodes over past 3 years. o:Height 71 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed.

s:patient presents with moderate weight loss over several months, moderate weakness. pt also reports of moderate vomiting. he is a 42 yo male. o:Height 71 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt c/o 7 weeks h/o moderate weakness.
